message.content:
cs.IT, cs.SY, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with sampling and reconstruction of spatial fields using mobile sensors, which involves concepts from information theory (sampling), control systems (mobile sensing), signal processing (reconstruction), networking (sensor configuration), and multimedia (audio field reconstruction). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.IT (Information Theory), followed by cs.SY (Systems and Control), cs.SI (Signal and Image Processing), cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture), and cs.MM (Multimedia).
